mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users(email, full_name, phone_number, password,role, create_at, update_at, is_active) VALUES( #{email},#{fullname},#{phoneNumber},#{password},#{role} ,#{createAt}, #{updateAt}, #{isActive});
mapper.select: SELECT id, email, password, full_name AS fullname, address, avatar, phone_number AS phoneNumber, create_at AS createAt, update_at AS updateAt, is_active AS isActive, role FROM users WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT id, email, full_name AS fullname, password, address, avatar, phone_number AS phoneNumber, create_at AS createAt, update_at AS updateAt, is_active AS isActive, role FROM users WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET full_name = #{fullname}, address = #{address}, avatar = #{avatar}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber}, update_at = #{updateAt} WHERE id = #{id}
